charges.charge_description: 18:1028(a)(7).F FRAUD WITH IDENTIFICATION DOCUMENTS-provided another individual's name, social security number, date of birth and official State of Vermont issued driver's license, w/intent to obtain items of value over $1, 000 (1)
18:1001.F STATEMENTS OR ENTRIES GENERALLY-obtained a post office box at the Bomoseen Post Office by identifying herself as someone she was not (2)

42:408(a)(7)(b).F MISUSE OF SOCIAL SECURITY NUMBER-completed a State of Vermont, Agency of Transportation, Department of Motor Vehicles"Application for Duplicate Operator License"using a social security number not assigned to her by the Commissioner of Social Security (3)
18:1344A.F BANK FRAUD-assumed identity of another person with the intent to obtain monies to which she was not entitled to (4)
